definition: to pour water into/to inject water into
to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Use a syringe device to gently direct water against the wall of the ear canal.
sentences.chinese: 使用注射器直接向耳孔壁注水。

sentences.english: He was also accused of forcing buyers to purchase water-injected meat.
sentences.chinese: 他還被指控迫使買家購買注水肉。

sentences.english: In order to solve this problem, the dynamic water injection balance technique is developed.
sentences.chinese: 爲了解決回拖卡管問題，動態注水平衡技術應運而生。

sentences.english: Biandong Oilfield has three Conflict in waterflooding developed zone.
sentences.chinese: 卞東油田注水開發調整效果差。

sentences.english: In a word, it increased the safety degree of reinjection water.
sentences.chinese: 與化學破乳劑相比，提高了回注水的安全性。

sentences.english: The basic noise conditions of the water-flooding pump station are investigated in the oil—field.
sentences.chinese: 調查了油田注水泵房噪聲的基本情況。

sentences.english: Finally I poured water into the triaxial cell through the pipeline of confining pressure and carried on the triaxial loading.
sentences.chinese: 之後再通過圍壓管向三軸室注水，進行三軸加載。

sentences.english: On Thursday morning, helicopters operated by Japan's self-defense forces made four passes over the plant's No. 3 reactor to dump water.
sentences.chinese: 週四早上，日本自衛隊的直升機四次對3號廠房注水。

sentences.english: The key of reservoir protection is the protection of the pore throats during water injection in low permeability oilfields.
sentences.chinese: 低滲油田注水過程中儲層保護的關鍵是保護孔喉。

sentences.english: Every miller draws water to his own mill.
sentences.chinese: 磨坊主都往自己磨裏注水。

sentences.english: Otherwise, water will slip between the glass door and the walls when filling.
sentences.chinese: 否則注水時水就會在玻璃門和箱壁之間流出。

sentences.english: For the water flooding development of water sensitive reservoir, pretreatment must be carried out to prevent the clay swelling.
sentences.chinese: 對於水敏油藏注水開發，必須進行防膨預處理。

sentences.english: Waterflooding is the main development ways in oil fields at present.
sentences.chinese: 注水開發是目前我國大多數油田的主要開發方式。

sentences.english: Methods of inspectiong and calculating the efficiency of water injection system in Shengli Oilfield are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了勝利油田注水系統效率統計測試計算方法。

sentences.english: Narrated the application of gas-turbine drive water injection pump.
sentences.chinese: 敘述了燃氣輪機在油田拖動注水泵的應用情況。

sentences.english: THEY SAT in the middle of a small lake fed by the waters of Brices Creek.
sentences.chinese: 他們停在一個由布賴斯小溪注水的小湖。

definition: to irrigate/to pour water into/to inject water into meat to increase its weight (plumping)/to cook the books/to post low-value messages (small talk etc) on Internet forums
to turn on the water/to let water out/to throw a game (sports)
to heat/to add warmth/to raise temperature/fig. to stimulate
to churn out large quantities without regard for quality (idiom); rough and slipshod work
(of soil etc) to wash away/to be eroded/(fig.) (of talented staff, followers of a religious faith, investment funds etc) to go elsewhere/to fail to be retained
cold water/unboiled water/fig. not yet ready (of plans)
